Description: CONTINUE THE 30+ YEAR MONITORING OF ACIDIC DEPOSITION IN SENSITIVE LAKES IN THE STATE OF VERMONT AS PART OF THE OVERALL LTM PROGRAMS THAT ASSESS THE EFFECTS OF EMISSIONS REDUCTIONS FROM THE CLEAN AIR ACT AMENDMENTS OF 1990 ON SURFACE WATER ACIDIFICATION.
